General.Name: Biodyne Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Biodyne Co., Ltd. develops and manufacturers medical devices, reagents, and consumables in South Korea. It offers PATHPLORER LBC system instruments and reagents, as well as consumable kits. The company exports its products to Russia, Germany, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Poland, China, Taiwan, and Thailand. Biodyne Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
